author: Special Correspondent
text:
Southern Railway has announced operation of express special trains on February 17 in connection with Mahamaham festival to clear the extra rush of traffic.

Mela charges as applicable would be levied on the tickets during the festival, a Southern Railway release here said.

The Thanjavur–Mayiladuthurai Express Special (07684) will leave Thanjavur at 9.40 a.m. and reach Mayiladuturai at 11.25 a.m. The train will have 16 second class DEMU coaches. It will stop at all stations between Thanjavur and Mayiladuthurai.

The Mayiladuthurai–Thanjavur Express (07685) will leave Mayiladuthurai at 9.35 a.m. and reach Thanjavur at 11.50 a.m. It will stop at all stations between Mayiladuthurai and Thanjavur.

The Thanjavur–Mayiladuthurai Express Special (07688) will leave Thanjavur at 2.15 p.m. and reach Mayiladuthurai at 4.20 p.m. It will stop at all stations between Thanjavur and Mayiladuthurai.

The Mayiladuthurai–Tiruchi Express Special (07689) will leave Mayiladuthurai at 3.35 p.m. and arrive in Tiruchi at 6.25 p.m. The train will stop at all stations between Mayiladuthurai and Thanjavur besides at Budalur and Tiruverumbur.
title: Special trains for Mahamaham
